metadata.synopsis: Marcus, the Flaming Spy, attempts to abduct Isobel.The dialogue either  immediately follows HAV_TakingIsobel_BriefInRoom, or starts if Marcus gets into combat after reaching Isobel's room.In the former case, the player is given the option to side with Isobel or Marcus.In the latter, Marcus defaults to being hostile to the player. The latter case can also play with a party member who is not of a normally speaking shape.After the ghouls are summoned, Mol is abducted and several Flaming Fists are incapacitated, if they are available.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Load SCL_Main_A2. goto 13 30 1033. Approach the checkpoint4. Press 1 until the dialogue ends (some ~12 times)5. Continue up to Isobel's room (-63; 33; 162)6. Wait for Marcus to address you.7. Use the 'attack' button.8. Pass the turn to him.OR:1. Load SCL_Main_A2. goto 13 30 1033. Approach the checkpoint4. Press 1 until the dialogue ends (some ~12 times)5. Continue up to Isobel's room (-63; 33; 162)6. Wait for Marcus to address you.7. Go through the dialogue without making him hostile.8. Talk to Isobel.9. Continue through her dialogue by pressing 1 until it ends.OR1. Rescue the Tieflings in act 1 (use debug book option)2. Load SCL_Main_A3. goto 13 30 1034. Approach the checkpoint5. Press 1 until the dialogue ends (some ~12 times)6. Continue up to Isobel's room (-63; 33; 162)7. Go through the dialogue without making him hostile.8. Talk to Isobel.9. Continue through her dialogue by pressing 1 until it ends.

32.speaker: Fist Marcus
32.text: Ah. True Soul. How glad I am to see you again.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus lands on the balcony, where Isobel had previously been performing her ritual. He lands kneeling, then rises to his full height, striding through the balcony door to take the same position as when he's already in the room.InternalNodeContext: Player revealed Marcus at the checkpoint.

45.speaker: Fist Marcus
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus lands on the balcony, where Isobel had previously been performing her ritual. He lands kneeling, then rises to his full height, striding through the balcony door to take the same position as when he's already in the room.InternalNodeContext: Marcus never vouched for the players. This is their first encounter with him.

83.speaker: Isobel
83.text: Marcus - is that you? What's happened to you?
83.context: NodeContext: Horror and shock as she realizes the monster in front of her is Marcus

26.speaker: Fist Marcus
26.text: I've been blessed. You can be too. Come with me and you can hear it all from Ketheric himself.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD Marcus is talking with his mind, keep gestures subtle and limited.

6.speaker: Player
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD Marcus is talking with his mind, keep gestures subtle and limited.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Isobel, do you know this man?
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD Marcus is talking with his mind, keep gestures subtle and limited.

101.speaker: Isobel
101.text: He's a Flaming Fist - or was. Came with the others when we created this haven.
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD Marcus is talking with his mind, keep gestures subtle and limited.

67.speaker: Isobel
67.text: He's a Flaming Fist - or was. Came with the others when we created this haven.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD Marcus is talking with his mind, keep gestures subtle and limited.

10.speaker: Fist Marcus
10.text: And I thank you for your hospitality.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD Marcus is talking with his mind, keep gestures subtle and limited.

28.speaker: Fist Marcus
28.text: True Soul. My instructions are clear: take the girl to Ketheric. Alive.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD Marcus is talking with his mind, keep gestures subtle and limited.

124.speaker: Player
124.text: Probe his thoughts for more information.

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *A haunting face swims into your mind's eye, its instructions vivid in your mind: nothing is more important than bringing the girl - alive.*

121.speaker: Narrator
121.text: *A haunting face swims into your mind's eye, its instructions vivid in your mind: nothing is more important than bringing the girl - alive.*

1.text: *The man's mind burns with empty ecstasy, utterly enslaved by the Absolute. You can sense nothing else.*

96.speaker: Narrator
96.text: *The man's mind burns with empty ecstasy, utterly enslaved by the Absolute. You can sense nothing else.*

98.speaker: Player
98.text: What does he want with her?

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Sounds like fun - I'm with you.

46.speaker: Isobel
46.text: What's going on? If you have something to say, say it.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Marcus is trying to kidnap you, Isobel. We're going to need to fight our way out of this one.

38.speaker: Fist Marcus
38.text: Pathetic. The Absolute sees all - your treachery will be punished!

79.speaker: Isobel
79.text: You two... You're... you're like them, aren't you? Absolutists.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: You're going to meet Ketheric - face-to-face.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I'm not like you - I don't take orders from the Absolute's cronies.

68.speaker: Fist Marcus
68.text: We are all alike in Her service. Do as I say. The rewards will be great.

128.speaker: Player
128.text: Touch her and I'll kill you.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Your pretender god holds no sway here, True Soul.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: I say we follow the winged freak.

112.speaker: Isobel
112.text: It would be your doom. And mine.

131.speaker: Player
131.text: Looks like this guy is trying to take my job - bringing you to Ketheric at Moonrise Towers.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: He is not 'blessed' - he is corrupted. Unnatural.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Those who walk a tranquil path want for nothing. Keep your 'blessings'.

109.speaker: Fist Marcus
109.text: You have not known tranquillity until you have felt the Absolute's embrace. That I can promise you.

66.speaker: Fist Marcus
66.text: Isobel - I've just gotten word. I need you to come with me. Jaheira's orders.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: He approaches Isobel with urgency. Holds out a hand to her or beckons her, as though to say 'come with me'

5.speaker: Isobel
5.context: NodeContext: Grim - realizing something is very amiss.

56.speaker: Fist Marcus
56.text: Let's do this. Remember: Ketheric wants her alive.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD

58.text: What the hells is going on?
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: She enters a combat stance-- ready to cast Guiding BoltNodeContext: SArcasm and fury in her voice as she enters battle position.

2.speaker: Isobel
2.text: What the hells is going on?
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: She enters a combat stance-- ready to cast Guiding BoltNodeContext: SArcasm and fury in her voice as she enters battle position.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Enough, Marcus. We aren't going anywhere.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Too late for that, Marcus. I already warned Isobel.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: No time to waste - we should follow Marcus.

7.speaker: Isobel
7.text: I know what this is. You're... you're one of them. Both of you.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Deception. Bah. Cut the act and let's fight, True Soul.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Come with us or I rip your arms off, Isobel.

78.speaker: Fist Marcus
78.text: No, True Soul. Do not harm her. My instructions were clear: we must take the girl to Ketheric alive.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: This man has been corrupted by the sickness infecting this land. Do not trust him, Isobel.

120.speaker: Player
120.text: Marcus is a True Soul, Isobel. He's here to kidnap you.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: We're going to have to fight our way out of this one, Isobel.

122.speaker: Fist Marcus
122.text: Pathetic. The Absolute sees all, you fool.

30.speaker: Isobel
30.text: You can't believe them, Marcus. Ketheric will never give you whatever it is you've been promised.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wings unfurl from his back and he stretches them in triumph.InternalNodeContext: Marcus vouched for us at the checkpoint and hasn't revealed his wings yet.

34.speaker: Fist Marcus
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wings unfurl from his back and he stretches them in triumph.InternalNodeContext: Marcus vouched for us at the checkpoint and hasn't revealed his wings yet.

13.speaker: Fist Marcus
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: He flexes his wings (already visible) and smirks.InternalNodeContext: We outed Marcus as a True Soul at the checkpoint; he already revealed his wings

37.speaker: Fist Marcus
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus holds both hands to his mouth to amplify a great, inhuman roar. At the sound of it, shouting breaks out in the inn, muffled noise of spells and weapons drawn.

57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus holds both hands to his mouth to amplify a great, inhuman roar. At the sound of it, shouting breaks out in the inn, muffled noise of spells and weapons drawn.

100.speaker: Mol
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: (post) Mol is dragged off screen by the ghoul towards Moonrise Tower.

0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fist Gretta gets incapacitated by a ghoul's spine.

25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fist Rahir gets incapacitated by a ghoul's spine.

106.speaker: Isobel
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: Preparing to cast Guiding BoltNodeContext: Ready ot strike, summoning Selune's power.

104.speaker: Isobel
104.text: Protect Isobel! Without her, we're all dead.
104.context: NodeContext: Addressed to player/ fellow HArper, right before combat - urgent, but not shouting

71.text: Protect Isobel! Without her, we're all dead.
71.context: NodeContext: Addressed to player/ fellow HArper, right before combat - urgent, but not shouting

92.speaker: Narrator
92.text: *With Isobel dead, the whole sanctuary will be flooded with blood... A far finer future than her taken alive.*

87.speaker: Fist Marcus
87.text: Remember: Ketheric wants her alive. No matter what.
87.context:
CinematicNodeContext: 

MindmeldNodeContext: Right before combat - heightened, with force.

40.speaker: Narrator
40.text: *This is a dear moment to play the reaper you play so well. Why let him take her alive, when you could flood them both with a bloodbath?*

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Just go quietly, Isobel. He doesn't want to hurt you.

19.speaker: Isobel
19.text: You - you're one of them, aren't you?

51.speaker: Isobel
51.text: What fools you both are. Ketheric will never give you whatever it is he's promised you.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: You're going to meet Ketheric - face-to-face.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Marcus is going to help me finish what I came here to do - bring you to Ketheric at Moonrise Towers.

55.speaker: Fist Marcus
55.text: He means you no harm, Isobel.

115.speaker: Isobel
115.text: The feeling isn't mutual. Ketheric is a liar, Marcus. He'll never give you whatever it is he's promised you.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: It's an ambush - and not a particularly clever one. Time to fight, I think.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: I'm not working for you, Marcus. My patron's deals are much more lucrative.

117.speaker: Fist Marcus
117.text: True Soul. My instructions are clear: take the girl to Ketheric. Alive.
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD Marcus is talking with his mind, keep gestures subtle and limited.

69.speaker: Fist Marcus
69.text: PLEASE RECORD (roar, not words):  Great roar that summons a load of ghouls into the camp.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus holds both hands to his mouth to amplify a great, inhuman roar. At the sound of it, shouting breaks out in the inn, muffled noise of spells and weapons drawn. Ghouls come pouring into the inn. Player and Isobel jump in surprise, then re-enter battle positions.

81.speaker: Fist Marcus
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: He walks toward the player and Isobel looking proud but uncanny; there's clearly something off/different about him now.

123.speaker: Isobel
123.text: Not a step closer, Marcus. I'm warning you.
123.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld VFX
NodeContext: Anger in his voice.

54.speaker: Fist Marcus
54.text: I don't know what your game is, but you can still redeem yourself if you follow my lead.
54.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld VFX
NodeContext: Anger in his voice.

86.speaker: Fist Marcus
86.text: My instructions are clear: take the girl to Ketheric. Alive.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: His eyes lock with the player's - TADPOLE MIND MELD

116.speaker: Fist Marcus
116.text: What in the world is going on?!
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ghouls come pouring into the inn. Player and Isobel jump in surprise, then re-enter battle positions.

49.text: What in the world is going on?!
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ghouls come pouring into the inn. Player and Isobel jump in surprise, then re-enter battle positions.

22.text: What in the world is going on?!
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked stare at Marcus from the Harper.

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: What in the world is going on?!
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Isobel is standing at HAV_TakingIsobel_SpyTransform_AtDoor_2396ef9e-e82a-42e8-9fe7-e3e24c2377f5.InternalNodeContext: Plays only if Isobel was on the balcony, Marcus is somewhere in the room, and not yet in the combat.NodeContext: Urgent; she has heard something terrible and is investigating

42.speaker: Isobel
42.text: What in the world is going on?!
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Isobel is standing at HAV_TakingIsobel_SpyTransform_AtDoor_2396ef9e-e82a-42e8-9fe7-e3e24c2377f5.InternalNodeContext: Plays only if Isobel was on the balcony, Marcus is somewhere in the room, and not yet in the combat.NodeContext: Urgent; she has heard something terrible and is investigating

119.speaker: Fist Marcus
119.text: Ah, another True Soul. How glad I am to see you.
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus lands on the balcony, where Isobel had previously been performing her ritual. He lands kneeling, then rises to his full height, striding through the balcony door to take the same position as when he's already in the room.InternalNodeContext: Another player revealed Marcus at the checkpoint.

129.speaker: Fist Marcus
129.text: Isobel - I've just gotten word. I need you to come with me. Jaheira's orders.
129.context: CinematicNodeContext: He approaches Isobel with urgency. Holds out a hand to her or beckons her, as though to say 'come with me'
